rules_text:
If X’Teth is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
When you cast this spell, if target opponent has more than 10 life, this spell deals damage to that opponent equal to the difference.
Retrofit {2}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It’s a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
